Where the Past shapes the Future Plan Your Visit

The History Museum complex is admission FREE.
Open Thursday-Sunday, noon-4pm.

Closed New Year's, Easter, Fourth of July, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve and Christmas days.

Los Altos History Museum
51 S. San Antonio Road
(between the library and community center)
Los Altos, CA 94022
650.948.9427
